overview: When a new detective is caught by a vicious psychopath and locked in a basement, he must use the knowledge he learned from some of the best detectives at Poker Night, then match wits against his captor.
tagline: How do you catch a killer when he's holding all the cards?...
cast: Beau Mirchoff|Ron Perlman|Giancarlo Esposito|Corey Large|Titus Welliver
